District Job Openings/Equal Employment, Equal Education

div.script: $(document).ready(function() {CheckScript('ModuleView');CheckScript('Mustache'); });

div.h4: Florence-Carlton parents, school and community will provide a safe, respectful environment that strives to prepare all students to become responsible, life-long learners by empowering them with the integrity, knowledge, and skills to contribute to a changing world.

div.script: $(document).ready(function() {CheckScript('ModuleView');CheckScript('Mustache'); });

img.alt: School Board Candidate Forum April 22nd, 7 pm

a.span: School Board Candidate Forum April 22nd, 7 pm

div.p: The forum will be live-streamed on Facebook through the school's social media.

a.title: Go to comments for School Board Candidate Forum April 22nd, 7 pm

img.alt: Notice is hereby given by the undersigned Clerk of Florence-Carlton School District #15-6, Ravalli &

div.p: Notice is hereby given by the undersigned Clerk of Florence-Carlton School District #15-6, Ravalli & Missoula Counties, State of Montana, that the Annual School Election will be held on Tuesday, May 5, 2020, by mail ballot only.

a.title: Go to comments for NOTICE OF ELECTION MAY 5, 2020

div.p: The Florence-Carlton Schools will start delivering online and offsite instruction to all pupils starting on Monday, March 30th. Please make sure that your email address is onfile with your child's school. Meals will continue to be available for pick up in the North parking lot and at all bus stops.

a.title: Go to comments for Governor Closes Schools through April 24th
Go to comments for Facilities Update Video & Letter

img.alt: Substitutes: The district is in need of substitutes for all certified and classified positions. Contact Donna Hemphill at 406-273-6751 ext. 1104 for more information.

a.span: Substitutes: The district is in need of substitutes for all certified and classified positions. Contact Donna Hemphill at 406-273-6751 ext. 1104 for more information.

a.title: Go to comments for Substitutes: The district is in need of substitutes for all certified and classified positions. Contact Donna Hemphill at 406-273-6751 ext. 1104 for more information.

img.alt: If you would like to make a deposit into your child's meal account you may do so online with the Mealtime Lunch App found under the Lunch Room tab.
